bn_IN {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    AmPmMarkers { 
            "\u09AA\u09C2\u09B0\u09CD\u09AC\u09BE\u09B9\u09CD\u09A3",

    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u099F\u09BE\u0995\u09BE",
            "INR ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "hh:mm:ss  z",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss aa z",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "EEEE dd MMM yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "\u09B0\u09AC\u09BF",
            "\u09B8\u09CB\u09AE",
            "\u09AE\u0999\u0997\u09B2",
            "\u09AC\u09C1\u09A7",

    }

        Title { "Bengali language locale for India" }

        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000, October" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[\u09B9\u09CD\u09AF\u09BE\u0981]" }
        NoExpression { "^[\u09A8\u09BE]" }
        YesStr { "\u09B9\u09CD\u09AF\u09BE\u0981" }
        NoStr { "\u09A8\u09BE" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "\u099C\u09BE\u09A8\u09C1\u09DF\u09BE\u09B0\u09C0",
            "\u09AB\u09C7\u09AC\u09CD\u09B0\u09C1\u09DF\u09BE\u09B0\u09C0",

    }
